misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
vulnerable_code: P1.key() method using PBEKeySpec with a weak iteration count (11010) and a low key length (16)
description: The P1.key() method uses a weak iteration count (11010) and a low key length (16) when generating the PBEKeySpec, which can lead to weak encryption and potential attacks.
recommendation: Increase the iteration count to at least 100,000 and use a larger key length (e.g. 256) when generating the PBEKeySpec to improve the encryption strength.
